enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive Notion template designed for entertainment enthusiasts who want to organize their viewing experience systematically. This tracker helps movie and TV show lovers maintain organized watchlists, monitor viewing history, and never lose track of must-watch content across different platforms.

features: Separate movie and TV show databases

problemsSolved: Forgetting about movies and shows you wanted to watch
Mixing up different types of content in a single messy list
Losing track of what you've already watched and loved
Missing release dates and availability on streaming platforms
solutionsBenefits: Never miss highly anticipated releases with organized tracking
Maintain clear separation between movies and series for better focus
Quickly reference your viewing history and rediscover favorites
Streamline content discovery with genre-based organization
idealFor: Movie and TV show enthusiasts with extensive watchlists
Streaming service subscribers managing multiple platforms
Content reviewers and critics tracking their viewing
notRecommendedFor: Casual viewers who watch sporadically (may be overcomplicated)
Users who prefer mobile-first solutions (Notion works better on desktop)
whatsIncluded: Pre-built movie tracking database with custom properties
TV show management system with episode tracking
Quick-add button templates for rapid entry

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can fully customize all databases, properties, and views to match your specific tracking preferences and add additional fields like ratings or notes.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion plan and doesn't require AI features to function properly.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Very simple - just duplicate the template to your workspace and start adding your content. No technical configuration required.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, this template uses current Notion features and database structures that remain compatible with the latest Notion updates.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The template includes setup instructions and examples to get you started quickly with your entertainment tracking.
